rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C185849

definition: Terminology relevant to the name of the non-clinical epoch.
name: SEND Epoch

terms.definition: A period in a study during which the subject receives challenge agent.
A period in a study prior to the subject receiving the first dose of investigational therapy or treatment, during which baseline measurements may be collected.
A period in a study immediately following the end of treatment during which the subject(s) is no longer receiving investigational therapy or treatment but is still being assessed.
A period in a study immediately following the end of treatment during which the subject(s) is no longer receiving investigational therapy or treatment and is not being assessed.
A period in a study during which subjects are receiving investigational therapy or treatment.
A period of time during a study when a subject is taken off of the investigational therapy or treatment in order to reduce the amount of investigational product within the body.
